com.metova.cappuccino

Interface CappuccinoResourceWatcher

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NoOpCappuccinoResourceWatcher, OperatingCappuccinoResourceWatcher

    public interface CappuccinoResourceWatcher

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void busy()
      Sets the internal state of the resource to busy, or not idle.
      void idle()
      Sets the internal state of the resource to idle; that is, not busy.
      boolean isIdle()
      Returns the busy/idle (false/true) state of the resource.
